citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on
05-Jun-18.
Contacted licensee and spoke with them by phone.
Additional Inspectors
Irwin Bryan, Compliance Specialist
